title: Foolish
lyrics:
On the tip of my dumb lips, a hurricane
Blowing around with all the words I won't say
'Cause baby, with those eyes, I know what you're doing
I can't be the only one that you are pulling
There, I said it

I never say it

Yeah, I said it

'Cause you, you get it right

You get it right, you get it right



I'm foolish, boy, for ya

I'm foolish, boy, for ya

Doomed but it is too late to judge, yeah

Foolish, boy, for ya



They think the end of this road I don't wanna reach

When our bus is going down, it's probably me

'Cause your touch, your love are just too good

It's just not fair

You got me fiending, I'll admit it, I don't care



There, I said it

I never say it

Yeah, I said it

'Cause you, you get it right

You get it right, you get it right



I'm foolish, boy, for ya

I'm foolish, boy, for ya

Doomed but it is too late to judge, yeah

Foolish, boy, for ya



You can call me selfish 'cause I want ya for my own, yeah

The physical emotion, oh, I want it all, yeah

You can call me selfish 'cause I want ya for my own, yeah

The physical emotion, oh, I want it all, yeah



You can call me, you can call me

You can call me, you can call me



Foolish, boy, for ya

I'm foolish, boy, for ya

Doomed but it is too late to judge, yeah

Foolish, boy, for ya
